Here in South Africa we don't need any permits or permissions to own
any ed=
ged weapons. 
Self defence is allowed, and any available weapon would be ok=
, as long
as there was serious risk to life.
Lethal force in defence of pro=
perty is not encouraged, and can lead to
charges. The weapon is irrellevant=
, be it one of my wakizashi or my Glock.

Brian
